speech.p: I remind the House that I expect to be in the Chair today until 11.30 am. I will make an announcement later about when the House will meet next week.
Can I encourage all Members who have not already taken the Oath to come to the Chamber this morning and do so?
Will Members wishing to take their seats please come to the Table?
The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by law:
Right honourable David Gordon Mundell, for Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale
Helen Elaine Maguire, Epsom and Ewell
Tahir Ali, Birmingham Hall Green and Moseley
Alistair Scott Carns, Birmingham Selly Oak
Georgia Anne Rebuck Gould, Queen’s Park and Maida Vale
Torcuil Crichton, Na h-Eileanan an Iar
Liam Joseph Conlon, Beckenham and Penge
The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by law:
Lewis Malcolm Atkinson, for Sunderland Central
Right honourable Sue-Ellen Cassiana Braverman, Fareham and Waterlooville
Carolyn Harris, Neath and Swansea East
Graham Leadbitter, Moray West, Nairn and Strathspey
Iqbal Hussain Mohamed, Dewsbury and Batley
Right honourable Thomas Georg John Tugendhat, Tonbridge
The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by law:
Rushanara Ali, for Bethnal Green and Stepney
Resolved, That this House do now adjourn until Tuesday 16 July.—(Gerald Jones.)
